frontmatter.title: Google Tag Manager and Gatsby
frontmatter.subtitle: Part 2
frontmatter.description: Part 2 in a series of blog posts on how to integrate Google Tag Manager with GatsbyJS

markdownRemark.html:
This is part 2 in a series on using Google Tag Manager (GTM) with Gatsby.

If you want to see a general overview of GTM and instructions on how to get started, see Google Tag Manager and Gatsby (Part 1).

Add tags, triggers and variables to GTM

Now that we've added GTM to your site, let's unleash the power of GTM.

Connect to Google analytics

Let's start collecting data!
